mapper.select: SELECT A.iapart, A.dong, A.jibun, A.apartmentname, A.dealamount , A.buildyear, A.dealyear, A.dealmonth, A.dealday, A.areaforexclusiveuse , A.`floor` , B.nm AS locationname FROM apartment_info A LEFT JOIN location_code B ON A.locationcode = B.`code` WHERE A.excd = #{excd} AND A.dealyear = #{year} AND A.dealmonth = #{month} ORDER BY A.dealamount DESC
SELECT code FROM location_code WHERE excd = #{excd}
